Class ArticleController

    • controller.ArticleController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ArticleController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    ArticleController class, as in the Script / Uni Book It's surely a bit modifed, because it uses the DB
    Author:
    ksaadDE

      private int savedArticleStatus
      When the user activates the save action / save event and it's completed, the val is stored here -1 means nothing happend, 0 error, 1 yeah it got saved!

      when one of the Buttons got pressed the save action "event" gets send
